DOJ chief Guevarra: Law applied as uniformly as possible on quarantine violators tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748005 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748005/doj-chief-guevarra-law-applied-as-uniformly-as-possible-on-quarantine-violators/story/ "I wouldn't really say that there is an inconsistent application of the rule of law. It just so happened that a greater number of those arrested came from the lower income groups and that's simply because they're the ones who were caught on the streets," DOJ chief Menardo Guevarra said. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 16:06:58 +0800
US Defense chief Esper's plan to visit China 'good' for South China Sea issues --Lorenzana tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748004 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748004/us-defense-chief-esper-s-plan-to-visit-china-good-for-south-china-sea-issues-lorenzana/story/ "I think it's good that Secretary Esper is planning to go to China to talk to his counterpart. You know, if the two superpowers will discuss things especially concerning the South China Sea, it's good for us here in the region," Lorenzana said at a pre-SONA forum and press conference on Wednesday. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 16:06:56 +0800

Those who don't wear face masks may be imprisoned for 10 to 30 days --Año tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747996 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747996/those-who-don-t-wear-face-masks-may-be-imprisoned-for-10-to-30-days-ano/story/ "Magkakaroon na kami ng uniform implementation kung papaano ipapatupad 'yung health standards... number of days in prison kapag nag-violate ka ng hindi pagsuot ng mask. We suggest 10 to 30 days, physical distancing also 10 to 30 days imprisonment," Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said during a pre-SONA forum and press conference. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 15:34:52 +0800
Xander Ford, ipinakilala ang kaniyang nobyo: Mas naiintindihan niya ako tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747995 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/747995/xander-ford-ipinakilala-ang-kaniyang-nobyo-mas-naiintindihan-niya-ako/story/ Matapos aminin na isa siyang bisexual, ipinakilala naman ngayon ni Xander Ford ang kaniyang nobyo. Nakamaskara sa simula ng vlog ang lalaki pero sa huli ay ipinakita rin nila ang kaniyang mukha. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 15:32:58 +0800
Duque not Duterte s whipping boy amid criticisms over COVID-19 response -- Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747994 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747994/duque-not-duterte-s-whipping-boy-amid-criticisms-over-covid-19-response-palace/story/ “I can tell you, the President has not been treating Secretary Duque as a whipping boy. The question I m asked more often is why not . But it has never been the case that I think the President has ever used him as a whipping boy,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 15:32:46 +0800

Año says IRR of anti-terror law will be fast-tracked tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747990 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747990/ano-says-irr-of-anti-terror-law-will-be-fast-tracked/story/ "It is a Supreme Court decision na after 15 days of official publication, the law is already effective. The only question is siyempre kung wala pang IRR, there are so many people who might question the law enforcers on carrying out this law on certain provisions and applications..." Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said. Wed, 22 Jul 2020 15:15:20 +0800
